description: This template deploys 3 new Azure VMs, each with its own public IP address and subnet. 1 new AD Domain Controller with AD CS and AD FS configured, 1 SQL Server 2016 and 1 SharePoint 2016 configured with 1 web application and 2 zones. Default zone uses Windows authentication and Intranet zone uses federated authentication with ADFS. Latest version of claims provider LDAPCP is installed and configured. It also provisions a key vault to store passwords and SharePoint passphrase.
summary: Deploy 3VMs: 1 DC running a certificate authority and ADFS, 1 SQL Server 2016 and 1 SharePoint 2016 server configured to use federated authentication with ADFS
